 2022-05172022-05-18,  PMO,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration of LISEANNE FORAND, Vice chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canadian High Arctic Research Station, for the period she is acting as Chairperson, effective November 18, 2021, until such time as she is no longer required to act as Chairperson.
